subject: AI & Agents
title: System Prompts: Setting the Stage
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: System Prompts: Setting the Stage.

hook.text: Behind every chatbot persona is a hidden instruction telling it exactly how to behave.

buildup.text: System prompts are instructions set by developers that users don't see.

discovery.text: They define personality, tone, boundaries, and capabilities for the entire conversation.

twist.text: Users can sometimes override system prompts with creative phrasing â€” a constant security challenge.

climax.text: Companies guard their system prompts like trade secrets. They shape the entire user experience.

punchline.text: The most important prompt is the one you never see.

quiz.question: What is a system prompt?
options: Hidden developer instructions that shape the AI's behavior
The first message a user sends
An error message from the system
